name: tarpon
description: `phytoplankton` - Frontend code for the console `tarpon` - Our backend API `raptor` - Our ML stack

scripts.openapi:local: cd tarpon && npm run openapi:build && npm run openapi:prepare && cd ../phytoplankton-console && ENV=local npm run openapi:build && cd ..
scripts.deploy:pipeline:clean: export ENV=deploy && npm run aws-login deploy && npm run synth:pipeline && npm run deploy:pipeline
scripts.deploy:pipeline-test:clean: export ENV=deploy-test && npm run aws-login deploy && npm run synth:pipeline && npm run deploy:pipeline
